Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers

Class SettingsController

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.Controller
com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.SettingsController
public class SettingsController extends Controller
This class is extended from Controller.
This class utilize the SettingsPageImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern. In charge of rendering the settings page, is the controller of the FXML based scene.
Author:
fy916
